section.title: Construction
section.para: The contructor for JModelBase takes an optional JRegistry object that defines the state of the model. If omitted, the contructor defers to the protected loadState method. This method can be overriden in a derived class and takes the place of the populateState method used in the legacy model class.

section.title: Usage
section.para: The JModelBase class is abstract so cannot be used directly. All requirements of the interface are already satisfied by the base class.
